column3: the  aggrieved  party or to  replace  such  goods  or to  refund the

column5: the  Panel  of  Inquiry  have  not

column2: consented  before  the  said  Panel  of Inquiry  to  make  an  order  on  the  basis  of the

To  recommence  an  inquiry  after  a  lapse  of 1  year,  without  notice  to  the

column1: parties, will necessarily deprive the legitimate expectations of a party to be heard.
